Traded from Atlanta to Philadelphia on 3/2/2020 (Going to ATL: SS Brian Whitley. Going to PHI: SS Adolfo Dinh, P Scott Davies)...

Injured on 7/31/2022 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/19/2023 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
